title: The Geography of Canada
brief_description: Documentary short on Canada’s geographical regions - the Pacific West Coast, the Interior Plains, the Canadian Shield, the St. Lawrence Valley, Appalachian region; and the arctic. Both animated dolls and live footage are used to provide facts on plant and animal life, Canada’s neighbours, climatic conditions, natural resources and wildlife conservation. Scenes of a beaver building a dam.
